rows.translation: By the heaven, holding mansions of the stars,

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.

rows.translation: And by the Promised Day.
And by the witness and that whereunto he beareth testimony,
(Self-)destroyed were the owners of the ditch
Of the fuel-fed fire,
When they sat by it,

rows.arabic: وَهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفْعَلُونَ بِٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ شُهُودٌ
rows.translation: And were themselves the witnesses of what they did to the believers.
rows.transliteration: wahum `alā mā yaf`alūna bil mu-minīna shuhūd

rows.arabic: وَمَا نَقَمُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤْمِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْحَمِيدِ
rows.translation: They had naught against them save that they believed in Allah, the Mighty, the Owner of Praise,
rows.transliteration: wa mā naqamū minhum illā an yu-minū billāhil `azīzil ḥamīd

rows.arabic: ٱلَّذِى لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ شَهِيدٌ
rows.translation: Him unto Whom belongeth the Sovereignty of the heavens and the earth; and Allah is of all things the Witness.
rows.transliteration: alladhī lahu mulkus samāwāti wal-arḍ ۚ wallāhu `alā kulli shay-in shahīd

rows.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ فَتَنُوا۟ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَتُوبُوا۟ فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ ٱلْحَرِيقِ
rows.translation: Lo! they who persecute believing men and believing women and repent not, theirs verily will be the doom of hell, and theirs the doom of burning.
rows.transliteration: innal ladhīna fatanul mu-minīna wal mu-mināti thumma lam yatūbū falahum `adhābu jahannama walahum `adhābul ḥarīq

rows.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَهُمْ جَنَّـٰتٌ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْكَبِيرُ
rows.translation: Lo! those who believe and do good works, theirs will be Gardens underneath which rivers flow. That is the Great Success.
rows.transliteration: innal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti lahum jannātun tajrī min taḥtihal-anhār ۚ dhālikal fawzul kabīr

rows.translation: Lo! the punishment of thy Lord is stern.
Lo! He it is Who produceth, then reproduceth,
And He is the Forgiving, the Loving,
Lord of the Throne of Glory,
Doer of what He will.
Hath there come unto thee the story of the hosts
Of Pharaoh and (the tribe of) Thamud?
Nay, but those who disbelieve live in denial
And Allah, all unseen, surroundeth them.
Nay, but it is a glorious Qur'an.
On a guarded tablet.
